title: About
text: Hello, my name is Maddie Meyerle! I am a Junior at the University of Nebraska in Lincoln studying Sports Media Communications and Advertising/Public Relations.

title: Denver Broncos QB Stats
text:
From Super Bowl Champions to Struggling Offense: The Broncosâ€™ Decline


Code
options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cran.rstudio.com/"))
library(nflverse)
library(tidyverse)




Code
pbp_data <- load_pbp(seasons = 2012:2023)




Code
broncos_data <- pbp_data |>
  filter(posteam == "DEN")




Code
broncos_offensive_yards <- broncos_data |>
  group_by(season) |>
  summarize(
    total_passing_yards = sum(passing_yards, na.rm = TRUE),
    total_rushing_yards = sum(rushing_yards, na.rm = TRUE),
    total_offensive_yards = total_passing_yards + total_rushing_yards,
    .groups = "drop"
  ) |>
  arrange(season)




Code
broncos_offensive_yards <- broncos_offensive_yards |>
  mutate(bar_color = ifelse(season == 2015, "#FB4F14", "#002244"))  




Code
ggplot(broncos_offensive_yards, aes(x = factor(season), y = total_offensive_yards, fill = bar_color)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(
    title = "The Broncos Offensive Freefall After Super Bowl 50",
    subtitle = "A clear drop in total offensive yards from 2012 to 2023 highlights Denver's continued offensive struggles after 2015",
    caption = "By: Maddie Meyerle | Source: nflverse",
    x = "Season",
    y = "Total Offensive Yards"
  ) +
  scale_fill_identity() +  
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 16),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = 8)
  )
